column4: hi, after setting up java runtime environment i somehow broke my browsers and get this error: INTERNAL ERROR on Browser End: Could not get the plugin manager, any help?
have you tried removing java?
yeah I've removed what I can several times.
maybe you can reinstall firefox
also i've reinstalled it a couple times, relinked in.
yeah did that too... a llot.
did you remove with --purge?
no! please elaborate, i dont know how to do that.
sudo apt-get remove --purge whatever
okay so that has me wondering how do I figure out what to put in for <whatever>
i'll try it. any idea what whatever's value would be for java runtime environment?
you don't remember what you installed?
not precisely what it would be called package wise, no. also, when I run --purge i get: E: Could not get lock /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (11 Resource temporarily unavailable)
are you running synaptic? or update manager?
you have to close those, only one can be open at a time
you should have gotten a pm from ubotu
ha oh thanks for the tab comment
I think I missed a comment of yours awhile back...  I really pay attention to the highlighting :)
im gonna rm the direcotry and reinstall, so i'll be back when i break something else =)
the purge worked this time.
whats the best way for reinstalling firefox?
I would think sudo apt-get install firefox       maybe add a --reinstall
after you have done whatever, you may want to run this for good measure: sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop^               and dont forget the ^,   I gota run, later
